About.Title: About
About.Content: A passionate web developer, I build,maintain and deploy websites and web apps for a variety of clients, respecting professional standards whilst creating visually stunning websites.

Website_Creation.title: Website Creation
Website_Creation.description: Do you need a portfolio website, an E-Commerce for your business or maybe a whole business managament tool? I can design and bring to life custom solution which scales to your needs.

Website_Optimization.title: Website Optimization
Website_Optimization.description: Already have a website but feel like it needs a bit of refreshing to keep up with modern competitor sites? Or do you need a new solution added to your existing website. We can work together to make your online presence shine.

Domain_Management.title: Domain Management
Domain_Management.description: When working together you dont need to worry about domain management or maintenance. I take care of all aspects of the tech side so you don't have to.

Contact: Let's start a project together! Contact me here:

ContactForm.Name: Name
ContactForm.Success_Message: Your message has been sent! I'll get back to you as soon as I can!
